monogr.title: Codex Climaci rescriptus; fragments of sixth century Palestinian Syriac texts of the Gospels, of the Acts of the apostles, and of St. Paul's Epistles. Also fragments of an early Palestinian lectionary of the Old Testament, etc.

body.bibl: Lewis, Agnes Smith, and Eberhard Nestle. Codex Climaci Rescriptus; Fragments of Sixth Century Palestinian Syriac Texts of the Gospels, of the Acts of the Apostles, and of St. Paul’s Epistles. Also Fragments of an Early Palestinian Lectionary of the Old Testament, Etc. Cambridge England: University Press, 1909.

Agnes Smith Lewis and Eberhard Nestle, Codex Climaci Rescriptus; Fragments of Sixth Century Palestinian Syriac Texts of the Gospels, of the Acts of the Apostles, and of St. Paul’s Epistles. Also Fragments of an Early Palestinian Lectionary of the Old Testament, Etc. (Cambridge England: University Press, 1909).
